project.name: Vega Media. CNP con umbrales 2018 y DIA
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD AS COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL AS COD_UMBRAL, First(IPA1.TOPONIMIA) AS TOPONIMIA, First(ACUIFEROS.NOMACU) AS NOMACU, First(ACUIFEROS.MASUB) AS MASUB FROM (ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO) INNER JOIN IPA1_UMBRAL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_UMBRAL.COD GROUP BY IPA1.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL HAVING (((IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL)='CSA 26/5/2018')) ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {0:d}_{1}_{2}.png 5 4 1
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>=#5/1/2018# ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA;
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO=? ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;

project.name: Cuenca Alta. Piezometría Sequía 2018

project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA;
